CustomField.description: Indicates whether adjustments may be grouped into buckets for use as targets for applying further adjustments. Only applicable when multiple adjustments are enabled via Max Adjustment Lines setting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether adjustments may be grouped into buckets for use as targets for applying further adjustments. Only applicable when multiple adjustments are enabled via Max Adjustment Lines setting.
CustomField.label: Enable Adjustment Buckets
